casebody.data:
No. 10-80. Thomas Weiss, Petitioner v. Assicurazioni Generali, S.p.A., et al. 562 U.S. 1089, 131 S. Ct. 698, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9036.

178 L. Ed. 2d 528,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Justice Sotomayor and Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 952, 131 S. Ct. 287, 178 L. Ed. 2d 250, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 7770.
